sentences.en: A high - surface - energy solid surface offers the most conducive thermodynamic condition for good wetting.
sentences.cn: 高表面 能的固体表面对良好的浸润提供了最有利的热力学条件.

sentences.en: After that, the formalism of statistical mechanics takes over, and calculates partition functions and thermodynamic functions.
sentences.cn: 从那以后，都是统计力学的内容，计算配分函数,和热力学函数。

sentences.en: Difficulties exist in the incorporation of the thermodynamic specifications.
sentences.cn: 在与热动力学的结合上存在困难.

sentences.en: Draw lessons from thermodynamic knowledge, advanced the idea of economic cycle efficiency.
sentences.cn: 借鉴热力学的知识, 提出了经济周期效率的概念.

sentences.en: Geologists use thermodynamic phase diagrams to understand processes in the earth.
sentences.cn: 地质学家利用热力学相图推测地球的演变过程.

sentences.en: Grasp how to calculate the entropy in a thermodynamic process.
sentences.cn: 掌握热力过程中熵变的计算方法.

sentences.en: It operates on the same thermodynamic principles as refrigeration.
sentences.cn: 它如同冷冻一样在相同的热力学原理下运转.

sentences.en: Mathematical simulation and synthetical optimization are main methods of thermodynamic system.
sentences.cn: 热力系统分析研究的主要方法是数学模拟和综合优化.

sentences.en: That is, in terms of equations of state. For any material Then we would really be able to essentially calculate anything. Anything thermodynamic.
sentences.cn: 换句话说，利用任何一种物质的状态方程,我们就能够实质上,计算所有物理量，所有热力学量。

sentences.en: The conducted thermodynamic analysis has shown the main chemical reactions.
sentences.cn: 应用热力学分析出该方法的主要化学反应.

sentences.en: The mathematical models for thermodynamic and kinetic calculation are established.
sentences.cn: 本文建立了十字滑块压缩机热力学和动力学的计算模型.

sentences.en: The quenching constants and thermodynamic parameters at different temperatures were calculated.
sentences.cn: 计算了不同温度下的猝灭常数和热力学参数.

sentences.en: The tephigram is a thermodynamic particularly suitable for representing atmospheric processes.
sentences.cn: 温熵图是一种热力学图,特别适合于描述大气过程.

sentences.en: Thermodynamic analysis shows that wolframite not only can be decompose.
sentences.cn: 热力学分析结果表明:黑钨矿既可以被酸分解,又可以被碱分解.

sentences.en: These molecular flips are generally attributed to cosmic rays or thermodynamic noise.
sentences.cn: 这些分子的随机变动一般归因于宇宙射线或者某种热动力学的干扰.

sentences.en: This must be brought into the picture, along with the performance of thermodynamic work cycles that link spontaneous and non-spontaneous processes like an engine.
sentences.cn: 这一点必须与热力学功循环的表现一起考虑，热力学连系到自发过程和像发动机那样的非自发过程。

sentences.en: This quantity is identical to the negative of the thermodynamic pressure.
sentences.cn: 这个量等于热动力压力的负值.

sentences.en: To maintain clarity and simplicity, we leave all thermodynamic considerations aside.
sentences.cn: 为了作到简单明白, 我们暂不考虑热力学问题.
